name: another-tv-taping-in-town-this-could-be-good
title: Another TV Taping In Town (This Could Be Good)
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We have high hopes for Legends & Lyrics, a new PBS show that’s taping in town this week. Five episodes will be filmed on Thursday and Friday, and everyone is invited! All of the tapings will be held at the Grand Masonic Lodge of Tennessee, downtown on 7th & Broadway, and the lineup is killer.

THURSDAY

  • Alternative; 9:30am – John Hiatt, Shawn Colvin, Jessi Colter & rising star Will Hoge
  • Americana; 2pm – Charlie Daniels, Phil Vassar, Jimmy Webb & rising star Mike Musick
  • Rock; 6pm – Kenny Loggins, Richard Marx, 3 Doors Down & rising star Nathan Lee

FRIDAY

  • Pop; 2:30pm – Mindy Smith, Leigh Nash of Sixpence None The Richer, Ed Roland of Collective Soul & rising star Rob Blackledge
  • Country; 7pm – Kris Kristofferson, Patty Griffin, Randy Owen & rising star Jonathan Singleton

All they ask is that you RSVP to tamberli@audiencecompany.com, specify which tapings you will attend, and show up an hour early.

Photo by Josh McConnell.
